meta.name: Circus Ex Mortis Investigator Expansion
meta.description: Unravel the mystery of the New Moon Circus with the help of 5 circus-themed investigators and nearly 400 player cards.
meta.author: The Beard

cards.back_flavor: Tarun was born the son of a genuine Fakir, an Indian holy man.  His father was dedicated in body and soul to the protection and salvation of his community, and did not hesitate to act when the cult of Shub-Niggurath was discovered within.  Though he attempted to expose them, he paid with his life, and Tarun found his father's mangled corpse at the edge of the nearby jungle.  Determined to avenge him, Tarun pursued the cult, using the ways of the Fakir as his guide.  He studied the scriptures and trained his body to withstand any sort of pain.  Ready at last, Tarun wandered the world, earning his living by performing the Fakir's feats of endurance to fascinated onlookers, but always with his mission of holy vengeance burning in his heart.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-3, Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Fakir's Sword, Measuring Up, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Guardian cards than Mystic cards.
cards.flavor: "The body is but a vessel to be filled with holy purpose."
cards.name: Tarun Chandavarkar
cards.text:
[reaction] After damage or horror is placed on a card you control: Replenish 1 charge or offering on an asset you control. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign]: +1.  You may either deal 1 damage or horror to a card you control or heal 1 damage or horror from a card you control.

cards.flavor:
"The Dunya is not the resting place.
It is the testing place."
cards.name: Fakir's Sword
cards.text: Tarun Chandavarkar deck only. Uses (4 charges). [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may spend up to 2 charges to deal that much additional damage for this attack.

cards.flavor: "This would have been a simple task for my father..."
cards.name: Measuring Up
cards.text: Revelation - Put Measuring Up into play in your threat area. You cannot choose to assign damage or horror to assets. [action] Take 2 damage, 2 horror, or any combination thereof: Discard Measuring Up. You cannot trigger Tarun's [reaction] ability while resolving this ability.

cards.back_flavor: Natalie was born to an affluent New Orleans family, though wealth never sparked anything in her.  Surrounded by the idle rich, she came to see the value in personal skill, and began to learn tricks of manual dexterity from the servants of the estate.  Natalie's parents hardly approved, and when she came of age, they introduced her to an echelon of society above the one that Natalie knew.  This was a world of secrecy and ritual, and of the dark unknowable.  Natalie was thrilled at first, but discovered that her family had long served one of these dark powers, and that she was expected to also serve.  Repulsed, she fled into the night, and began making her way as a circus performer as she seeks a way to fight her nightmarish legacy.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-3, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Juggler's Batons, Losing Focus, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Seeker cards than Rogue cards.
cards.flavor:
"The mind must be steady,
for the world is not."
cards.name: Natalie Soulier
cards.text: You do not discard assets in excess of available slots after they enter play. Assets played in excess of available slots gains fast. Forced - At the start of the upkeep phase, discard assets you control in excess of available slots. [elder_sign]: +1. You may swap an asset you control with an asset in your hand, paying the difference between their costs.

cards.flavor: "Anything I touch, flowing like water."
cards.name: Juggler's Batons
cards.text:
Natalie Soulier deck only.
[reaction] After Juggler's Batons enters play: Draw a card for each asset you control in excess of available slots.
[action]: Place Juggler's Batons on the bottom of your deck.

cards.flavor: "I can't let such things distract me..."
cards.name: Losing Focus
cards.text: Revelation - Put Losing Focus into play in your threat area. Forced - After you discard 1 or more cards during the upkeep phase: Take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Losing Focus

cards.back_flavor: Jie was born to a family of skillful acrobats attached to the a traveling circus in China.  He learned to walk on his hands as soon as he did his feet.  Everything about the job appealed to Jie, from the refined dedication to the thrill of adrenaline.  Though he lived for excitement, he soon discovered that fear exists for a reason.  A nervous man joined the circus one day, purportedly as a magician.  After only a week in their employ, Jie was the only witness when an unearthly hound appeared out of thin air, tore the man's throat out, and disappeared once again.  Jie was terrified, but fascinated.  He regularly achieved what people thought was impossible, but by seeking out monsters like the hound, he could defy what even he thought was impossible.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-3, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Feats of Daring, Death Defying, Foolhardy, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Rogue cards than Survivor cards.
cards.flavor: "Is that a challenge?"
cards.name: Lai Jie
cards.text:
[reaction] When the round begins: Choose a non-weakness skill in your hand and attach it to your location or a connecting location.  At the end of the round, discard the attached skill.
[elder_sign]: +2.  If you succeed, you may choose a skill committed to this test and resolve its effects an additional time.

cards.name: Feats of Daring
cards.text:
Lai Jie deck only.  Permanent.
[reaction] After an investigator initiates a skill test: Commit one of your skills attached to that investigator's location to that test.  After resolving the test, attach that skill to the location instead of discarding it. (Limit once per investigator per round.)

cards.flavor: "Death watches as eagerly as the audience!"
cards.name: Death Defying
cards.text: Lai Jie deck only. If this test is successful, draw 1 card for each keyword on the target card. (Hunter, Massive, Retaliate, Alert, Peril, Surge, Haunted, etc.)

cards.flavor: "Now watch me do it with one hand behind my back!"
cards.name: Foolhardy
cards.text: Revelation - Put Foolhardy into play in your threat area. Forced - After you resolve a test and did not succeed by 2 or more: Take 1 damage or 1 horror (choose one). Forced - At the end of your turn, if you took 2 or more tests during your turn, discard Foolhardy. Otherwise, shuffle Foolhardy back into your deck.

cards.back_flavor: Arturo was taught to respect the power of fire.  He grew up in rural Mexico, and with the trace of Aztec blood in his veins came their traditions, including the fire dance to honor Xiuhtecuhtli.  But Arturo's mind could not accept mysticism alone.  As a young man, he traveled to Mexico City and applied to the university there, for he wanted to control and master fire.  Adding chemistry to his ancestral skill pleased Arturo, but it attracted the attention of people who sought his talents for destruction in the name of a being called Cthugha, an eternal and inconceivable fire.  As before, Arturo could not accept a fire that science could not explain.  He fled the cult, making his way as a performer as he searched for explanations to these impossible things.  There was no fire he could not master.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 copies of Breath of Fire, Fire Eating, Uncontrolled Fire, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Mystic cards than Seeker cards.
cards.flavor: "Fire is illumination."
cards.name: Arturo Rangel
cards.text:
[reaction] After you deal damage to 1 or more enemies via an event: That enemy's location gets -1 shroud value until the end of the current phase. (Limit once per damage instance.)
[elder_sign]: +1.  The next event you play this round gets -2 cost.

cards.flavor: "Feed the flames."
cards.name: Fire Eating
cards.text:
Arturo Rangel deck only.  Uses (2 charges).
[reaction] After you activate the [reaction] ability on Arturo Rangel: Add 1 charge to Fire Eating.
[free] During your turn, except during an action, spend X charges, where X is half your location's shroud value (rounded up, minimum 1): Discover a clue from your location.

cards.flavor: "Is it chemistry or magic?"
cards.name: Breath of Fire
cards.text: Arturo Rangel deck only. Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, attach Breath of Fire to the target. [free]: Deal 1 damage to the attached enemy. You may activate this ability from any location. (Limit once per round.)

cards.flavor:
"Money is, in some respects, like fire. It is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master."
-- P. T. Barnum, The Art of Money Getting
cards.name: Uncontrolled Fire
cards.text: Revelation - Discard a non-weakness event in your hand. Then, deal 1 damage to each investigator at your location. If you cannot discard an event, shuffle Uncontrolled Fire back into your deck.

cards.back_flavor: Effie was a born optimist, in spite of everything.  When her parents died, there was certainly nothing to laugh about, but it seemed like a a joke when she was sent to live with her uncle, a clown at a local circus.  Effie was like her uncle in almost every way, and as he taught her the tricks of the trade, she learned something else -- that her uncle had the same strange dreams that she did.  Identical gruesome creatures and cosmic vistas lurked in both their dreams, but what could either of them do but laugh at it?  At first it was merely something to bond over, but after a few short years, Effie's uncle passed away from a heart attack after reciting words she couldn't understand.  There was more to these dreams than wild imagination, and Effie resolved to seek out these horrors and do what she does best -- laugh in their faces.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Bright Side of Life, Pratfall, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Survivor cards than Guardian cards.
cards.flavor:
"The joke may be on us,
but we'll be the ones laughing
at the end of the day."
cards.name: Effie Dunlap
cards.text:
[reaction] After a non-weakness asset you control leaves play: Play an asset, paying its cost. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign]: +1.  You may choose an asset in your discard pile and shuffle it back into your deck.

cards.flavor: "Could be worse, you know!"
cards.name: Bright Side of Life
cards.text:
Effie Dunlap deck only.
[reaction] After a non-weakness asset you control leaves play, exhaust Bright Side of Life: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "I meant to do that!"
cards.name: Pratfall
cards.text: Revelation - You must discard up to 2 non-weakness assets you control. For each asset you cannot or choose not to discard, lose 1 action instead. You cannot trigger player effects in response to discarding the chosen assets.

cards.name: Barbell
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. [action]: Choose an investigator at your location. Each non-weakness card in the chosen investigator's hand with exactly 1 icon gains [combat] until the end of the round. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You succeed at a test with 6 or more [combat] and/or [wild] icons committed: Your basic attack actions deal +1 damage.

cards.name: Bullhorn
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Bullhorn: Engage. Engage each enemy at your location. Tension -- You are engaged with 2 or more non-swarm enemies: Your engage and play actions do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.name: Chakram
cards.text: [action] If Chakram is ready: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you do not succeed by 2 or more, exhaust Chakram. Tension -- You succeed on an attack with Chakram by 4 or more: Chakram no longer exhausts if you do not succeed by 2 or more.

cards.name: Invisible Wall
cards.text: Uses (3 charges). [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy would move to your location, spend 1 charge: Cancel that movement. Tension -- You spend the last charge on Invisible Wall: Invisible Wall gains "[free]: Discard Invisible Wall and draw a card."

cards.name: Marching Drum
cards.text: [reaction] After you enter a location, exhaust Marching Drum: Choose an investigator at a connecting location and move them to your location. Tension -- You enter a location with 2 or more total non-swarm enemies at that location and/or treacheries attached to that location: You get +1 [agility].

cards.name: Réka Zilahy
cards.text: You get +1 [combat]. [reaction] When a card is committed to a test you are performing, exhaust Réka Zilahy and deal 1 damage to her: Double the icons on that card. Tension -- Your [combat] value is 12 or higher during a skill test: Ignore the cost of dealing damage to Réka Zilahy for the above [reaction] ability.

cards.flavor: "All in the wrist!"
cards.name: Demonstration
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you succeed at any skill test.
The next time another investigator initiates a test this round using the same skill, that investigator gets +2 skill value for that test.

cards.name: "Drum roll, please!"
cards.text:
Play only as your first action.  This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
For the remainder of the round, each time you succeed at a skill test, choose 2 different options (max 3 times):
- Draw a card.
- Gain a resource.
- Heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

cards.flavor: You were expecting a human cannonball?
cards.name: Light the Fuse
cards.text: Attach Light the Fuse to your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- The investigation phase begins: Light the Fuse gains: "[free] Discard Light the Fuse: Deal 2 damage to each enemy and investigator at the attached location. You may activate this ability from any location."

cards.name: Live Dangerously
cards.text: Fast. Play when your turn begins. Put Live Dangerously into play in your play area. [reaction] After an enemy attacks you (even if that attack was canceled): Draw a card or gain a resource. If that enemy had 4 or more health, draw an additional card or gain an additional resource. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Live Dangerously.

cards.flavor: "Your attention, please!"
cards.name: Make an Entrance
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you enter a location with 1 or more enemies present.
The next time that you succeed at a skill test this round, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location and discover a clue from your location.

cards.flavor: "Purity of purpose requires purity of spirit."
cards.name: Ritual Cleansing
cards.text:
Fast.  Play when the round begins.
Choose an investigator at your location.  Until the end of the round, when the chosen investigator reveals a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token, ignore the effects of that token (except for its modifier).

cards.flavor: "What a chump!  What a buffoon!"
cards.name: Slapstick
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after a card effect or game effect is canceled or ignored by a player effect at your location.
Heal 1 horror or discover a clue at your location.

cards.flavor: "Stand back, quick!"
cards.name: Take the Reins
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after another investigator at your location fails a skill test.
Attempt that test.  If you succeed, also cancel all effects of the first failed test.

cards.name: Test of Endurance
cards.text: Fast. Play when the round begins. Put Test of Endurance into play with X+1 resources on it. [reaction] After amount of damage and/or horror is dealt to you, remove 1 resource from Test of Endurance: Heal 1 damage or horror from you or an [[Ally]] asset you control. (Limit once per instance.) Forced - At the end of the round, discard Test of Endurance.

cards.flavor: "A challenge this meager is almost insulting!"
cards.name: Bravado
cards.text: If you drew a treachery this round, Bravado gains [willpower].  If you drew an enemy this round, Bravado gains [combat].

cards.name: Team Effort
cards.text: While Team Effort is in your hand or committed to a test, it gains the icons on each [[Ally]] asset you control.  If you succeed, heal 1 damage or 1 horror from an [[Ally]] asset you control

cards.flavor:
"You're bleeding!"
"Only a reasonable amount."
cards.name: Unflappable
cards.text: Unflappable gains [wild] for every 4 total damage and/or horror on your investigator card.

cards.name: Barbell
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. [action]: Choose an investigator at your location. Each non-weakness card in the chosen investigator's hand with 2 or fewer icons gains [combat] until the end of the round. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You succeed at a test with 6 or more [combat] and/or [wild] icons committed: Your basic attack actions deal +1 damage.

cards.name: Bullhorn
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Bullhorn: Engage. Engage each enemy at your location. Tension -- You are engaged with 2 or more non-swarm enemies: Your engage, draw, resource, and play actions do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.flavor: "All in the wrist!"
cards.name: Demonstration
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you succeed at any skill test.
The next time another investigator initiates a test this round using the same skill, that investigator gets +3 skill value for that test.

cards.flavor: "Purity of purpose requires purity of spirit."
cards.name: Ritual Cleansing
cards.text:
Fast.  Play when the round begins.
Choose an investigator at your location.  Until the end of the round, when the chosen investigator reveals a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token, ignore the effects of that token (except for its modifier) and heal 1 damage from that investigator or an [[Ally]] asset they control.

cards.flavor: "Stand back, quick!"
cards.name: Take the Reins
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after another investigator at your location fails a skill test.
Attempt that test.  If you succeed, also cancel all effects of the first failed test.  Then, both you and the chosen investigator may draw a card.

cards.flavor: "A challenge this meager is almost insulting!"
cards.name: Bravado
cards.text: If you drew a treachery this round, Bravado gains [willpower] [intellect].  If you drew an enemy this round, Bravado gains [combat] [agility].

cards.flavor:
"You're bleeding!"
"Only a reasonable amount."
cards.name: Unflappable
cards.text: Unflappable gains [wild] for every 4 total damage and/or horror among cards you control.

cards.name: Chakram
cards.text: [action] If Chakram is ready: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you do not succeed by 2 or more, exhaust Chakram. Tension -- You succeed on an attack with Chakram by 4 or more: Chakram no longer exhausts if you do not succeed by 2 or more.

cards.name: Invisible Wall
cards.text: Uses (3 charges). [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy would move to your location, spend 1 charge: Cancel that movement and deal 1 damage to the target enemy. Tension -- You spend the last charge on Invisible Wall: Invisible Wall gains "[free]: Discard Invisible Wall and draw 2 cards."

cards.flavor: "Your attention, please!"
cards.name: Make an Entrance
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you enter a location with 1 or more enemies present.
For the remainder of the round, after you succeed at a skill test, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location and discover a clue from your location (max 3 times).

cards.flavor: "What a chump!  What a buffoon!"
cards.name: Slapstick
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after a card effect or game effect is canceled or ignored by a player effect at your location.
Heal 2 horror or discover 2 clues at your location, or any combination thereof.

cards.name: Test of Endurance
cards.text: Fast. Play when the round begins. Put Test of Endurance into play with X+1 resources on it. [reaction] After any amount of damage and/or horror is dealt to you, remove up to that many resources from Test of Endurance: For each resource removed, heal 1 damage or 1 horror from you or an [[Ally]] asset you control. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Test of Endurance.

cards.name: Team Effort
cards.text: While Team Effort is in your hand or committed to a test, it gains the icons on each [[Ally]] asset at your location.  If you succeed, heal 1 damage and 1 horror from an [[Ally]] asset at your location.

cards.name: Marching Drum
cards.text: [reaction] After you enter a location, exhaust Marching Drum: Choose any number of investigators among connecting locations and move them to your location. Tension -- You enter a location with 2 or more total non-swarm enemies at that location and/or treacheries attached to that location: You get +1 [agility].

cards.name: Réka Zilahy
cards.text: You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [combat]. [reaction] When a card is committed to a test you are performing, exhaust Réka Zilahy and deal 1 damage or 1 horror to her: Double the icons on that card. Tension -- Your [combat] value is 10 or higher during a skill test: Ignore the cost of dealing damage or horror to Réka Zilahy for the above [reaction] ability.

cards.name: "Drum roll, please!"
cards.text:
Fast.  Play at the start of your turn.
For the remainder of the round, each time you succeed at a skill test, choose 2 different options (max 4 times):
- Draw a card.
- Gain a resource.
- Heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

cards.flavor: It WAS a human cannonball!
cards.name: Light the Fuse
cards.text: Attach Light the Fuse to your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- The investigation phase begins: Light the Fuse gains: "[free] Discard Light the Fuse: Deal 3 damage to each enemy at the attached location. Each investigator at that location tests [agility] (3). Each investigator who succeeds disengages from each enemy and move to a connecting location. Each investigator who fails takes 3 damage. You may activate this ability from any location."

cards.name: Live Dangerously
cards.text: Fast. Play when your turn begins. Put Live Dangerously into play in your play area. [reaction] After an enemy attacks you (even if that attack was canceled): Draw 2 cards, gain 2 resources, or any combination thereof. If that enemy had 4 or more health, draw an additional card or gain an additional resource. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Live Dangerously.

cards.name: Memorization
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. [reaction] When 1 or more of your cards would enter your discard pile during the upkeep phase, exhaust Memorization: Choose 1 of those cards and shuffle it back into your deck instead. Tension -- You draw 4 or more total cards during your turn: You may choose an additional card when you activate the above [reaction] ability.

cards.name: Mind Reading
cards.text: Uses (4 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret and choose an enemy at your location: Investigate. This test uses the chosen enemy's fight value instead of your location's shroud value. This action does not provoke acts of opportunity. Tension -- You successfully use the above [action] ability on an enemy with fight value greater than its location's shroud value: If you succeed on the above [action] ability, you discover 1 additional clue (including the action it was activated).

cards.name: Segmented Lens
cards.text: [reaction] After Segmented Lens enters play: Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is your location's printed shroud value. Put them back on top of your deck in any order. Tension -- You discover 4 or more clues during your turn: Segmented Lens gains "[free] Exhaust Segmented Lens: Look at the top card of any player's deck or the encounter deck."

cards.name: Simon Carver
cards.text: You get +1 [willpower]. [reaction] After Simon Carver enters play: Name a [[Trait]] and look at the top 5 cards of your deck. For each card with the named [[Trait]], you may either draw or discard that card. Shuffle the searched deck. Tension -- You play 3 cards in the same round that share a [[Trait]]: Simon Carver gets +1 health and +1 sanity.

cards.flavor: "Where is that thing even plugged in?"
cards.name: Spotlight
cards.text: [reaction] After Spotlight enters play: Reduce your location's shroud value by 2 until the end of your turn. Tension -- The last clue on your location is discovered: You get +1 [intellect].

cards.name: Tuning Fork
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Tuning Fork: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this test for each treachery in your threat area, attached to your location, and next to the agenda deck. Tension -- You successfully investigate a location with Tuning Fork with +3 or more [intellect] from its ability: If you succeed when using the above [action] ability, you discover an additional clue.

cards.name: Equilibrium
cards.text:
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck and the top 2 cards of the encounter deck.  Choose and discard 2 of those cards.  Return the remaining cards to the tops of their respective decks in any order.
If you did not discard any encounter cards, discover a clue from your location.

cards.flavor: Hide your face so the world will never find you.
cards.name: Masquerade
cards.text: As an additional cost to play Masquerade, place one of your clues on your location. Evade. You may use [intellect] instead of [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, and the target is non-[[Elite]], discard that enemy.

cards.flavor: "...all while reciting Shakespeare's sonnets!"
cards.name: Multitasking
cards.text: Draw 1 card for each different type of action you have performed this round (including this action) (types include activate, engage, evade, fight, investigate, move, play, resource, and draw).

cards.flavor:
"If you think that's impressive,
wait until I get the other three out."
cards.name: Muscle Memory
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after an investigator at your location plays an asset.
That investigator may immediately play another asset at -1 cost.

cards.name: Pyrotechnics
cards.text: Fight or Evade. Add your [intellect] value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, attach Pyrotechnics to the target enemy. Forced - At the start of the investigation phase, deal 1 damage to the attached enemy and discard Pyrotechnics.

cards.flavor: "Didn't even need my abacus."
cards.name: Rapid Calculation
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you place 1 of your clues on your location.
Discover a clue from your location.  Draw a card.

cards.name: Read the Audience
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach Read the Audience to your location. Tension -- An enemy moves to the attached location or makes an attack at the attached location: The attached location gets -2 shroud value. Each enemy at the attached location gets -1 evade.

cards.flavor: "...without the aid of hidden tools, wires, ropes, platforms, trap doors, or body doubles!"
cards.name: "Silence, please!"
cards.text:
Fast.  Play when you initiate a skill test.
Non-weakness cards cannot be committed to this test.  Other events cannot be played until this test resolves.  If this test succeeds, discover 2 clues from your location.

cards.flavor: "...wait, did I see something just now?"
cards.name: Subliminal Messaging
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you discover 1 or more clues.
Give 1 to 3 clues to another investigator at your location.  If you gave 3 clues, the chosen investigator draws a card.

cards.flavor: "I am concentrating, but not on the plates."
cards.name: Concentration
cards.text: Concentration gains [wild] for every 2 clues you control (max +3).

cards.flavor: "If the mind is still, the hand is steady."
cards.name: Precision
cards.text: If you discovered 1 or more clues this round, Precision gains [intellect].  If you placed 1 or more clues on your location this round, Precision gains [agility].

cards.name: Synchronized
cards.text: If this test is successful, each investigator who committed 1 or more cards to this test draws a card.

cards.name: Memorization
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. [reaction] When 1 or more of your cards would enter your discard pile during the upkeep phase, exhaust Memorization: Choose up to 2 of those cards and shuffle them back into your deck instead. Tension -- You draw 4 or more total cards during your turn: You may choose an additional card when you activate the above [reaction] ability.

cards.name: Tuning Fork
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Tuning Fork: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this test for each treachery in your threat area, attached to your location, and next to the agenda deck. Tension -- You successfully investigate a location with Tuning Fork with +2 or more [intellect] from its ability: If you succeed when using the above [action] ability, you discover an additional clue.

cards.name: Equilibrium
cards.text:
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and the top 3 cards of the encounter deck.  Choose and discard 3 of those cards.  Return the remaining cards to the tops of their respective decks in any order.
If you did not discard any encounter cards, discover 2 clues from your location.

cards.flavor: Hide your face so the world will never find you.
cards.name: Masquerade
cards.text: As an additional cost to play Masquerade, place one of your clues on your location. Evade. You may use [intellect] instead of [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, and the target is non-[[Elite]], discard that enemy.

cards.flavor: "...all while reciting Shakespeare's sonnets!"
cards.name: Multitasking
cards.text: Fast. Draw 1 card for each different type of action you have performed this round (types include activate, engage, evade, fight, investigate, move, play, resource, and draw).

cards.flavor: "I am concentrating, but not on the plates."
cards.name: Concentration
cards.text: Concentration gains [wild] for every 2 clues you control (max +3).  If you succeed, lower your location's shroud value by 1 until the end of the phase.

cards.flavor: "If the mind is still, the hand is steady."
cards.name: Precision
cards.text: If you discovered 1 or more clues this round, Precision gains [willpower] [intellect].  If you placed 1 or more clues on your location this round, Precision gains [combat] [agility].

cards.name: Mind Reading
cards.text: Uses (5 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret and choose an enemy at your location: Investigate. This test uses the chosen enemy's fight value instead of your location's shroud value. This action does not provoke acts of opportunity. Tension -- You successfully use the above [action] ability on an enemy with fight value equal to or greater than its location's shroud value: If you succeed on the above [action] ability, you discover 1 additional clue (including the action it was activated).

cards.name: Segmented Lens
cards.text: [reaction] After Segmented Lens enters play: Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is equal to 2 + your location's printed shroud value. Put them back on top of your deck in any order. Tension -- You discover 4 or more clues during your turn: Segmented Lens gains "[free] Exhaust Segmented Lens: Look at the top card of any player's deck or the encounter deck."

cards.name: Pyrotechnics
cards.text: Fight or Evade. Add your [intellect] value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, attach Pyrotechnics to the target enemy. Forced - At the start of the investigation phase, deal 2 damage to the attached enemy and 1 damage to each other enemy at its location, and discard Pyrotechnics.

cards.flavor: "...without the aid of hidden tools, wires, ropes, platforms, trap doors, or body doubles!"
cards.name: "Silence, please!"
cards.text:
Fast.  Play when you initiate a skill test.
Non-weakness cards cannot be committed to this test.  Other events cannot be played until this test resolves.  If this test succeeds, discover 2 clues from among your location and connecting revealed locations.

cards.flavor: "...wait, did I see something just now?"
cards.name: Subliminal Messaging
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you discover 1 or more clues.
Give 1 to 3 clues to another investigator at your location.  The chosen investigator draws a card for each clue given.

cards.name: Synchronized
cards.text: If this test is successful, each investigator who committed 1 or more cards to this test draws a card.  If this test fails, return each committed card not named Synchronized to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Simon Carver
cards.text: You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect]. [reaction] After Simon Carver enters play: Name a [[Trait]] and look at the top 5 cards of your deck or the encounter deck. For each card with the named [[Trait]], you may either draw or discard that card. Shuffle the searched deck. Tension -- You play 3 cards in the same round that share a [[Trait]]: Simon Carver gets +1 health and +1 sanity.

cards.flavor: "Where is that thing even plugged in?"
cards.name: Spotlight
cards.text: [reaction] After Spotlight enters play: Reduce your location's shroud value by 2 until the end of the round. Tension -- The last clue on your location is discovered: You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].

cards.flavor:
"If you think that's impressive,
wait until I get the other five out."
cards.name: Muscle Memory
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after an investigator at your location plays an asset.
That investigator may immediately play up to 2 other assets at -2 cost each.

cards.flavor: "Didn't even need my mechanical calculator."
cards.name: Rapid Calculation
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you place any amount of your clues on your location.
Discover that many clues from your location.  For each clue discovered, draw a card.

cards.name: Read the Audience
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach Read the Audience to your location. Tension -- An enemy moves to the attached location, makes an attack or activates a forced effect printed on that enemy at the attached location: The attached location gets -3 shroud value. Each enemy at the attached location gets -2 evade.

cards.name: Alma Rowland
cards.text: You get +1 [agility]. [action] Exhaust Alma Rowland and discard an asset you control: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You defeat an enemy with the above [action] ability: When you discard an asset to pay for the above [action] ability, you may instead shuffle the chosen asset back into your deck

cards.name: Bullseye Air Pistol
cards.text: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. Tension -- You successfully attack an exhausted enemy with the above [action] ability: At the start round, Bullseye Air Pistol replenishes 1 ammo.

cards.name: Deck of Trick Cards
cards.text: [free] Exhaust Deck of Trick Cards: Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may pay 1 resource to draw that card. Tension -- You have 8 or more cards in your hand: Deck of Trick Cards gains "[free]: Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)"

cards.name: Disappearing Coins
cards.text: Uses (1 charge). Charges on Disappearing Coins may be spent to pay for assets and events. [reaction] After an investigator at your location spends 3 or more resources at once: Add 1 charge to Disappearing Coins. Tension -- You spend 4 or more resources at once: Reduce the resource requirement of the above [reaction] ability to 2.

cards.name: Hickory Cane
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Hickory Cane: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for every 5 resources in your resource pool (max +3). This attack deals +1 damage. Tension -- You have 15 resources in your resource pool: You get +1 [combat] for the above [action] ability for every 4 resources instead.

cards.name: Throwing Knife
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Throwing Knife: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage. Tension -- You deal damage in excess of an enemy's remaining health via the above [action] ability: The above [action] ability adds your [agility] value to your [combat] value instead of replacing it.

cards.flavor: "The trick isn't even half over!"
cards.name: Acrobatic Flourish
cards.text:
Fast.  Play when you would reveal a token from the chaos bag during a skill test.
Reveal an additional token for this test.  If you succeed, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.

cards.name: Balancing Act
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Put Balancing Act into play in your play area. Attach any number of assets you control to Balancing Act. Each attached asset takes up no slots and its text box is treated as if it were blank (except for Traits). Forced - At the end of the round: Move each asset attached to Balancing Act back into your play area. Discard Balancing Act.

cards.flavor: "Watch as the impossible becomes possible!"
cards.name: Dazzling Spectacle
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you succeed at a skill test.
Dazzling Spectacle gets -1 cost for each non-weakness card committed to that test.
Discover 2 clues from your location.

cards.name: Grand Finale
cards.text: Grand Finale gets -1 cost for each other action you have taken this round. Fight or Investigate. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this test. If you succeed while fighting, this attack deals +3 damage. If you succeed while investigating, you discover 2 additional clues. If it is your turn, end your turn.

cards.flavor:
"Risking the lowest of lows
to achieve the highest of highs!"
cards.name: High Flying
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you succeed a skill test by 3 or more.
Repeat the effects of a skill committed to that test.

cards.flavor: "Trust me!"
cards.name: Leap of Faith
cards.text: Move an investigator from a connecting location to your location.  The next time this round that you commit a card to a test the chosen investigator is performing, that card gains [wild].

cards.flavor: "...and lands in a basin of water!"
cards.name: Running Start
cards.text: Fight or Evade. If you have moved or been moved at least once this round, you get +1 skill value for this skill test, and if you succeed, deal 1 damage to the target enemy.

cards.flavor: "Let's hope the wind doesn't pick up."
cards.name: Smoke Bomb
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach Smoke Bomb to your location. Investigators get +1 skill value while evading at the attached location. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Smoke Bomb.

cards.name: "Step right up!"
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach "Step right up!" to your location. The first successful skill test performed by each investigator at this location each round succeeds by 1 more. Tension -- A test at this location succeeds by 6 or more: "Step right up!" gains: "[free] Discard "Step right up!": Each investigator at the attached location gains 2 resources."

cards.flavor: "Flexibility in any sort of space."
cards.name: Contortion
cards.text: If you moved to a location with an enemy this round, Contortion gains [combat].  If you revealed or put a location into play this round, Contortion gains [agility].

cards.flavor: "Not impressed yet?"
cards.name: Escalation
cards.text:
You may commit Escalation to any type of test you are performing.
Increase the difficulty of this test by 1.  If you succeed, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.  If you succeed by 2 or more, draw 1 additional card and gain 1 additional resource.

cards.name: Flowing Motion
cards.text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test succeeds by 2 or more, choose another skill committed to this test and commit it to your next skill test this round, if able.

cards.name: Deck of Trick Cards
cards.text: [free] Exhaust Deck of Trick Cards: Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may pay 1 resource to draw that card. Tension -- You have 6 or more cards in your hand: Deck of Trick Cards gains "[free]: Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)"

cards.name: Hickory Cane
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Hickory Cane: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for every 5 resources in your resource pool. This attack deals +1 damage. Tension -- You have 15 resources in your resource pool: You get +1 [combat] for the above [action] ability for every 4 resources instead.

cards.name: Balancing Act
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Put Balancing Act into play in your play area. Attach any number of assets you control to Balancing Act. Each attached asset takes up no slots and its text box is treated as if it were blank (except for Traits). Forced - At the end of the round: Move each asset attached to Balancing Act back into your play area. Discard Balancing Act. You may immediately trigger an [action] ability on one of the moved assets.

cards.flavor: "Watch as the impossible becomes possible!"
cards.name: Dazzling Spectacle
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you succeed at a skill test.
Dazzling Spectacle gets -1 cost for each non-weakness card committed to that test.
Discover 2 clues from your location.

cards.flavor:
"Risking the lowest of lows
to achieve the highest of highs!"
cards.name: High Flying
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you succeed a skill test by 2 or more.
Repeat the effects of a skill committed to that test.

cards.flavor: "Flexibility in any sort of space."
cards.name: Contortion
cards.text: If you moved to a location with an enemy this round, Contortion gains [intellect] [combat].  If you revealed or put a location into play this round, Contortion gains [willpower] [agility].

cards.name: Flowing Motion
cards.text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test succeeds by 1 or more, choose another skill committed to this test and commit it to your next skill test this round, if able.

cards.name: Disappearing Coins
cards.text: Uses (3 charges). Charges on Disappearing Coins may be spent to pay for assets and events. [reaction] After an investigator at your location spends 3 or more resources at once: Add 1 charge to Disappearing Coins. Tension -- You spend 4 or more resources at once: Reduce the resource requirement of the above [reaction] ability to 2.

cards.name: Throwing Knife
cards.text: Fast. [action] Exhaust Throwing Knife: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. If you succeed by 1 or more, this attack deals +1 damage. Tension -- You deal damage in excess of an enemy's remaining health via the above [action] ability: The above [action] ability adds your [agility] value to your [combat] value instead of replacing it.

cards.flavor: "The trick isn't even half over!"
cards.name: Acrobatic Flourish
cards.text:
Fast.  Play when you would reveal a token from the chaos bag during a skill test.
Reveal an additional token for this test.  If you succeed, deal 2 damage to up to 2 enemies at your location.

cards.flavor: "...and lands in a basin of water!"
cards.name: Running Start
cards.text: Fight or Evade. This ability may target an enemy at a connecting location. If you do, immediately move to that location and engage that enemy. If you have moved or been moved at least once this round, you get +2 skill value for this skill test, and if you succeed, deal 2 damage to the target enemy.

cards.name: "Step right up!"
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach "Step right up!" to your location. Each successful skill test at this location each round succeeds by 1 more. Tension -- A test at this location succeeds by 6 or more: "Step right up!" gains: "[free] Discard "Step right up!": Each investigator at the attached location gains 2 resources."

cards.flavor: "Not impressed yet?"
cards.name: Escalation
cards.text:
You may commit Escalation to any type of test you are performing.
Increase the difficulty of this test by 1.  If you succeed, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.  Draw 1 additional card and gain 1 additional resource for every 2 points you succeed by.

cards.name: Alma Rowland
cards.text: You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility]. [action] Exhaust Alma Rowland and discard an asset you control: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location (2 damage instead if the chosen asset had "Uses (X)" and at least 1 resource on it). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You defeat an enemy with the above [action] ability: When you discard an asset to pay for the above [action] ability, you may instead shuffle the chosen asset back into your deck

cards.name: Bullseye Air Pistol
cards.text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. Tension -- You successfully attack an exhausted enemy with the above [action] ability: At the start round, Bullseye Air Pistol replenishes 1 ammo.

cards.name: Grand Finale
cards.text: Grand Finale gets -1 cost for each other action you have taken this round. Fight or Investigate. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this test. If you succeed by 2 or more, draw 2 cards. If you succeed while fighting, this attack deals +3 damage. If you succeed while investigating, you discover 2 additional clues. If it is your turn, end your turn.

cards.flavor: "Trust me!"
cards.name: Leap of Faith
cards.text: Move an investigator from a connecting location to your location.  You may engage any number of enemies engaged with the chosen investigator.  The next time this round that you commit a card to a test the chosen investigator is performing, that card gains [wild] [wild].  This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.flavor: "Let's hope the wind doesn't pick up."
cards.name: Smoke Bomb
cards.text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach Smoke Bomb to your location. Investigators get +2 skill value while evading and +1 skill value while fighting at the attached location. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Smoke Bomb.

cards.name: Charmer's Pungi
cards.text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Search the top 2 cards of your deck for an event and draw it. You may spend 1 charge to search 2 additional cards. Shuffle your deck. Tension -- You play 3 total events in the same round: You may search the top 3 cards of your deck instead when activating the above [action] ability.

cards.name: Ermes Menegatti
cards.text: You get +1 [intellect]. [action] Exhaust Ermes Menegatti: Move an unengaged non-[[Elite]] enemy from your location to a connecting location, or vice versa. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You control 5 or more clues: The above [action] action can target engaged non-[[Elite]] enemies.

cards.name: Levitation
cards.text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Move an investigator at your location to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You move while an enemy is engaged with you: When you activate the above [action] ability, each non-[[Elite]] enemy engaged with the chosen investigator gets -1 fight and -1 evade until the end of the round.

cards.name: Magician's Wand
cards.text: Uses (2 charges). [reaction] After you activate an [action] ability on an asset you control that takes up 1 or more arcane slots: Add 1 charge to Magician's Wand. [action] Spend 2 charges: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. Tension -- There are 7 charges on Magician's Wand: When activating the above [action] ability, you may instead spend 3 charges to deal +2 damage.

cards.name: Seeing Stone
cards.text: [reaction] When the round begins or when Seeing Stone enters play: Name a [[Trait]]. [reaction] After an investigator draws a card with the chosen [[Trait]], exhaust Seeing Stone: That investigator reveals that card and heals 1 horror. Tension -- There is 5 or more doom in play: When activating the first [reaction] ability on Seeing Stone, you may name two [[Traits]] instead.

cards.name: Wheel of Fire
cards.text: Uses (6 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. This attack deals +1 damage for each other time you have activated this action this round (max +3). Tension -- You successfully attack using the above [action] ability with 6 or more [willpower] and/or [wild] icons committed: The above [action] ability ignores the aloof keyword.

cards.flavor: "One after the other from my hand!"
cards.name: Duplication
cards.text: Choose an [[Item]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location.  Its owner searches their deck and discard pile for another copy of that asset (by title) and draws it.  Shuffle that player's deck if it was searched.

cards.flavor: No, the other kind of firewalking.
cards.name: Firewalking
cards.text: Fast. Put Firewalking into play in your play area. [reaction] After you leave a location: Deal 1 damage to each enemy at that location. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Firewalking.

cards.name: Impaling Swords
cards.text: Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, you may repeat this attack on any enemy at your location with +1 difficulty for each time you have already performed this test during this action (max 3 attacks).

cards.name: "Is this your card?"
cards.text: Look at the top 4 cards of the encounter deck.  For each enemy in the looked-at cards, deal 2 damage to each copy of that enemy in play.  For each treachery in the looked-at cards, discard each copy of that treachery from play.  Return the cards to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

cards.name: Mirror Image
cards.text: Put Mirror Image into play in your play area. [reaction] When an enemy attack or treachery would deal any amount of damage or horror to you: Place 1 of that damage or horror on Mirror Image. (Max 3 tokens on Mirror Image.) Tension -- There are 3 tokens on Mirror Image: Mirror Image gains: "[free] Discard Mirror Image: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location."

cards.name: "Nothing up my sleeve!"
cards.text: Fast. Play at the start of the investigation phase only if you have 3 or more other cards in your hand. Put "Nothing up my sleeve!" into play in your play area and place each card in your hand facedown beneath it. You get +1 to each of your skills, but you cannot draw cards. Forced - At the end of the round, discard "Nothing up my sleeve!" and draw each card beneath it.

cards.flavor: "Were you expecting a dove?"
cards.name: Prestidigitation
cards.text: Choose any number of assets you control that use charges, secrets, ammo, or supplies.  Move up to 3 resource tokens between any of the chosen assets.

cards.name: Rope Trick
cards.text: Attach Rope Trick to your location. Limit 1 per location. [reaction] When the enemy phase begins, exhaust Rope Trick: Non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot attack you until the end of the round. Any investigator at the attached location can activate this ability. Forced - At the end of the round: You must either spend 1 resource or discard Rope Trick.

cards.flavor: "Follow the motion of my hands."
cards.name: Snake Charming
cards.text: Parley. Test [willpower] (X) where X is the fight value of an enemy at your location. If the target is a [[Creature]] enemy, this test gets -2 difficulty. If you succeed, automatically evade the target enemy. If you evaded a non-[[Elite]] enemy, it cannot ready during the next upkeep phase.

cards.name: Court Death
cards.text:
Commit only to a test you are performing.
If a [skull] or [auto_fail] token is revealed during this test, take 2 damage, 2 horror, or any combination thereof.

cards.flavor: "Follow my hand as it passes through the ring."
cards.name: Misdirection
cards.text: If you played an asset this round, Misdirection gains [willpower].  If you played an event this round, Misdirection gains [intellect].

cards.name: Touch of Destiny
cards.text: When you commit Touch of Destiny, you may place 1 doom on an enemy or treachery at your location.  If you do, Touch of Destiny gains [wild] [wild].

cards.name: Charmer's Pungi
cards.text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Search the top 2 cards of your deck for an event and draw it. You may spend 1 charge to search 2 additional cards. Shuffle your deck. Tension -- You play 3 total events in the same round: You may search the top 4 cards of your deck instead when activating the above [action] ability.

cards.name: Levitation
cards.text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Move an investigator at your location to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You move while an enemy is engaged with you: When you activate the above [action] ability, each non-[[Elite]] enemy engaged with the chosen investigator gets -1 fight and -2 evade until the end of the round.

cards.name: Mirror Image
cards.text: Put Mirror Image into play in your play area. [reaction] When an enemy attack or treachery would deal any amount of damage or horror to you: Place 1 of that damage or horror on Mirror Image. (Max 4 tokens on Mirror Image.) Tension -- There are 3 tokens on Mirror Image: Mirror Image gains: "[free] Discard Mirror Image: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location."

cards.flavor: "Were you expecting a dove?"
cards.name: Prestidigitation
cards.text:
Fast.  Play during any [free] window.
Choose any number of assets you control that use charges, secrets, ammo, or supplies.  Move up to 3 resource tokens between any of the chosen assets.

cards.name: Rope Trick
cards.text: Attach Rope Trick to your location. Limit 1 per location. [reaction] When the enemy phase begins, exhaust Rope Trick: Non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot attack you until the end of the round. Any investigator at the attached location can activate this ability. Forced - At the end of the round: You must either spend 1 resource or discard Rope Trick.

cards.flavor: "Follow my hand as it passes through the ring."
cards.name: Misdirection
cards.text: If you played an asset this round, Misdirection gains [willpower] [combat].  If you played an event this round, Misdirection gains [intellect] [agility].

cards.name: Touch of Destiny
cards.text: When you commit Touch of Destiny, you may place 1 doom on an enemy or treachery at your location.  If you do, Touch of Destiny gains [wild] [wild] [wild].

cards.name: Magician's Wand
cards.text: Uses (2 charges). [reaction] After you activate an [action] ability on an asset you control that takes up 1 or more arcane slots: Add 1 charge to Magician's Wand. [action] Spend 2 charges: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. Tension -- There are 7 charges on Magician's Wand: When activating the above [action] ability, you may instead spend 3 charges to deal +2 damage.

cards.name: Seeing Stone
cards.text: [reaction] When the round begins or when Seeing Stone enters play: Name a [[Trait]]. [reaction] After an investigator draws a card with the chosen [[Trait]], exhaust Seeing Stone: That investigator reveals that card, heals 1 horror, and gains 1 resource. Tension -- There is 5 or more doom in play: When activating the first [reaction] ability on Seeing Stone, you may name two [[Traits]] instead.

cards.flavor: "One after the other from my hand!"
cards.name: Duplication
cards.text: Choose an [[Item]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location.  Its owner searches their deck and discard pile for another copy of that asset (by title), draws it, and plays it, paying its cost.  Shuffle that player's deck if it was searched.

cards.name: Impaling Swords
cards.text: Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, you may repeat this attack on any enemy at your location with +1 difficulty for each time you have already performed this test during this action (max 5 attacks).

cards.flavor: "Follow the motion of my hands."
cards.name: Snake Charming
cards.text: Parley. Test [willpower] (X) where X is the fight value of an enemy at your location. If the target is a [[Creature]] or [[Monster]] enemy, this test gets -2 difficulty. If you succeed, automatically evade the target enemy. If you succeed by 2 or more, discover a clue at your location. If you evaded a non-[[Elite]] enemy, it cannot ready during the next upkeep phase.

cards.name: Court Death
cards.text:
Commit only to a test you are performing.
If a [skull] or [auto_fail] token is revealed during this test, take 2 damage, 2 horror, or any combination thereof.
If damage and/or horror assigned by this effect defeats an asset, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Ermes Menegatti
cards.text: You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility]. [action] Exhaust Ermes Menegatti: Move an unengaged non-[[Elite]] enemy from your location to a connecting location, or vice versa. The chosen enemy loses hunter and cannot have doom placed on it until the end of the round. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension -- You control 5 or more clues: The above [action] action can target engaged non-[[Elite]] enemies.

cards.name: Wheel of Fire
cards.text: Uses (6 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage for each other time you have activated this action this round (max +3). Tension -- You successfully attack using the above [action] ability with 6 or more [willpower] and/or [wild] icons committed: The above [action] ability ignores the aloof keyword.

cards.name: Firewalking
cards.text: Fast. Put Firewalking into play in your play area. [reaction] After you enter or leave a location: Deal 1 damage to each enemy at that location (max one location per movement). Forced - At the end of the round, discard Firewalking.

cards.name: "Is this your card?"
cards.text: Look at the top 8 cards of the encounter deck.  For each enemy in the looked-at cards, deal 2 damage to each copy of that enemy in play.  For each treachery in the looked-at cards, discard each copy of that treachery from play.  Return the cards to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

cards.name: "Nothing up my sleeve!"
cards.text: Fast. Play at the start of the investigation phase only if you have 2 or more other cards in your hand. Put "Nothing up my sleeve!" into play in your play area and place each card in your hand facedown beneath it. You get +2 to each of your skills, but you cannot draw cards. Forced - At the end of the round, discard "Nothing up my sleeve!" and draw each card beneath it.

cards.name: Baleful Laughter
cards.text: Uses (4 charges). [reaction] After a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location is evaded, spend 1 charge: That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase and gets -1 horror until the end of the round. Tension -- There are 2 or more exhausted enemies at your location: Baleful Laughter gains: "[free] Discard Baleful Laughter: Heal 1 horror from each investigator and [[Ally]] asset at your location."

cards.name: Bucket of Grease
cards.text: Uses (3 supplies). [free] Spend 1 supply: A card at your location loses one of the following keywords until the end of the round: hunter, patrol, retaliate, alert, elusive. Tension -- There are 10 or more cards in your discard pile: Bucket of Grease gains: "[free] Discard Bucket of Grease: Move an investigator or non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location to a connecting location."

cards.name: Coil of Rope
cards.text: [free] During a skill test you are performing, exhaust Coil of Rope: You get +1 skill value for this test for each treachery in your threat area. Tension -- You have no cards in your hand or no resources: Coil of Rope gains: "[free] During your turn: Discard Coil of Rope and take an investigate action."

cards.name: Mallet
cards.text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If there are more cards in your discard pile than in your deck, this attack deals +1 damage. Tension -- You discard an asset you control that takes up 1 or more slots: When you activate the above [action] ability, you may discard the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Pandora Gould
cards.text: [reaction] After you succeed at a test on an encounter card or take 1 or more actions to discard an encounter card, exhaust Pandora Gould: Reduce the difficulty of your next test this round by 2. Tension -- There is at least 1 damage and 1 horror on Pandora Gould: You get +1 skill value during tests printed on encounter cards.

cards.name: Prybar
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. You get +1 skill value during basic fight and investigate actions. Tension -- You defeat an enemy or discover the last clue from a location during a basic action: Prybar gains: "[free] Discard Prybar: Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location or discover 2 clues from your location (choose one)."

cards.flavor: "Whatever doesn't kill you makes you laugh."
cards.name: Brace for Impact
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you take 1 or more damage.
Gain 2 resources for each damage taken.

cards.name: Distraction
cards.text: Put Distraction into play in your play area. Each non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location and each connecting location loses all prey keywords and gains "Prey - Bearer of Distraction only." Tension -- An enemy makes an attack against you: Distraction gains: "[free] Discard Distraction: Move an enemy at your location to a connecting location."

cards.flavor: "Played you like a violin!"
cards.name: "Gotcha!"
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you fail a skill test.
Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location and automatically evade it.

Fast.  Play after 1 or more damage and/or horror is healed from an investigator at your location.
Discover a clue at your location or heal 1 additional damage or horror (choose one).

cards.flavor: "At least I saw it coming, right?"

cards.text:
Fast.  Play after you take 1 or more horror.

Fast.  Play when you initiate a fight test, 
evade test, or a test printed on a scenario card.

cards.flavor: "I wasn't too attached to it anyway."
cards.name: Rebound
cards.text:
Fast.  Play after an asset you control leaves play.
You get +3 skill value for the next test you perform this round.

cards.name: Safety Net
cards.text:
Uses (3 supplies).  If Safety Net has no supplies, discard it.
Attach Safety Net to your location.  Limit 1 per location.
[reaction] When you fail a skill test, spend 1 supply: Cancel all effects of the failed test.  Any investigator at the attached location can activate this ability.

cards.flavor: "Nearly... there..."
cards.name: Thrilling Escape
cards.text:
As an additional cost to play Thrilling Escape, choose and discard an asset you control.
Discard a treachery in your threat area.  This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.name: Cutting Close
cards.text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
After you commit Cutting Close, seal 4 random non-[auto_fail] tokens on Cutting Close.  After this test resolves, release each token on Cutting Close.

cards.name: Fluke?
cards.text: If this test is successful, discard a non-story asset you control.

cards.name: Laugh it Off
cards.text: Max 1 committed per skill test. You may commit Laugh it Off to any type of test. If this test fails, put Laugh it Off into play in your play area and seal each non-[auto_fail] token revealed during this test on it. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Laugh it Off.

cards.name: Baleful Laughter
cards.text: Uses (5 charges). [reaction] After a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location is evaded, spend 1 charge: That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase and gets -1 horror until the end of the round. Tension -- There are 2 or more exhausted enemies at your location: Baleful Laughter gains: "[free] Discard Baleful Laughter: Heal 1 horror from each investigator and [[Ally]] asset at your location."

cards.name: Bucket of Grease
cards.text: Uses (4 supplies). [free] Spend 1 supply: A card at your location loses one of the following keywords until the end of the round: hunter, patrol, retaliate, alert, elusive. Tension -- There are 10 or more cards in your discard pile: Bucket of Grease gains: "[free] Discard Bucket of Grease: Move an investigator or non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location to a connecting location."

cards.name: Performer's Costume
cards.text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test with a difficulty of 4 or higher, exhaust Performer's Costume: Draw a card or gain a resource (choose one). Tension -- Commit another copy of Performer's Costume to a skill test: Performer's Costume gains "[free] During a skill test you are performing: Increase the difficulty of that test by 1."

cards.name: Torch
cards.text: Uses (4 supplies). [free] During a fight, evade, or investigate test at your location, spend 1 supply: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. Tension -- You reduce the difficulty of a test to 0: Torch gains "[free] During your turn, discard Torch: Take an additional action this turn."

cards.flavor: "Keep the audience on the edge of their seats!"
cards.name: Rising Tension
cards.text:
Fast.  Play at the start of your turn.
Choose an asset you control with a Tension effect.  Immediately activate its Tension result until the end of the round.

cards.name: Breathtaking
cards.text: Breathtaking gains [wild] for each card you control with an inactive Tension result.  If you succeed by 2 or more, place 1 Tension token on an asset you control with a Tension effect.

cards.name: Performer's Costume
cards.text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test with a difficulty of 4 or higher, exhaust Performer's Costume: Draw a card or gain a resource (choose one). Tension -- Commit another copy of Performer's Costume to a skill test: Performer's Costume gains "[free] During a skill test you are performing: Increase the difficulty of that test by 1."

cards.name: Breathtaking
cards.text: Breathtaking gains [wild] for each card you control with a Tension effect.  If you succeed by 2 or more, place 1 Tension token on an asset you control with a Tension effect.

cards.name: Torch
cards.text: Uses (6 supplies). [free] During a fight, evade, or investigate test at your location, spend 1 supply: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. Tension -- You reduce the difficulty of a test to 0: Torch gains "[free] During your turn, discard Torch: Take an additional action this turn."

cards.flavor: "Keep the audience on the edge of their seats!"
cards.name: Rising Tension
cards.text:
Fast.  Play at the start of your turn.
Choose up to 3 assets you control with a Tension effect.  Immediately activate their Tension results until the end of the round.

cards.name: Diffident
cards.text: Revelation - Put Diffident into play in your threat area. You cannot take draw or resource actions after your first action each round. [action] [action]: Discard Diffident.

cards.name: Growing Suspense
cards.text: Revelation - Put Growing Suspense into play in your threat area. Tension -- The investigation phase ends: Each test you perform during your turn gets +1 difficulty. [action] [action]: Discard Growing Suspense.

cards.name: Indecisive
cards.text: Revelation - Put Indecisive into play in your threat area. Forced - After you play a card: Discard a card from your hand at random. [action] [action]: Discard Indecisive.

cards.name: Overcautious
cards.text: Revelation - Put Overcautious into play in your threat area. You cannot take fight or investigate actions as your first action each round. [action] [action]: Discard Overcautious.

cards.name: Reluctant
cards.text: Revelation - Put Reluctant into play in your threat area. Forced - After you spend 1 or more resources: Lose half that many resources (rounded up). [action] [action]: Discard Reluctant.
